scripts.prerelease: pnpm check && pnpm test && pnpm build
scripts.release: pnpm build && pnpm --filter @mosa-ui/components version patch && pnpm --filter @mosa-ui/components publish
scripts.release:minor: pnpm build && pnpm --filter @mosa-ui/components version minor && pnpm --filter @mosa-ui/components publish
scripts.release:major: pnpm build && pnpm --filter @mosa-ui/components version major && pnpm --filter @mosa-ui/components publish
scripts.release:beta: pnpm build && pnpm --filter @mosa-ui/components version prerelease --preid=beta && pnpm --filter @mosa-ui/components publish --tag beta
